alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Sebastian (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 29 at 8:54PM CST until December 30 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...In Oklahoma... Pushmataha and Choctaw Counties. In Arkansas... Franklin and Sebastian Counties. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 9 AM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Visibilities are expected to be reduced to less than one quarter mile by the dense fog, creating hazardous driving conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...There is the fog potential in much of eastern Oklahoma and northwest Arkansas. It is possible that this advisory could be expanded for other nearby areas.
info.instruction: If driving tonight, slow down, use your low beam headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. Be prepared for sudden changes in visibility.
